list.Title: Forrest Gump
list.Actors: Tom Hanks, Rebecca Williams, Sally Field, Michael Conner Humphreys
list.Plot: Forrest Gump is a simple man with a low I.Q. but good intentions. He is running through childhood with his best and only friend Jenny. His 'mama' teaches him the ways of life and leaves him to choose his destiny. Forrest joins the army for service in Vietnam, finding new friends called Dan and Bubba, he wins medals, creates a famous shrimp fishing fleet, inspires people to jog, starts a ping-pong craze, creates the smiley, writes bumper stickers and songs, donates to people and meets the president several times. However, this is all irrelevant to Forrest who can only think of his childhood sweetheart Jenny Curran, who has messed up her life. Although in the end all he wants to prove is that anyone can love anyone.

list.Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
list.Actors: Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Alan Rickman, Daniel Radcliffe
list.Plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione continue their quest of finding and destroying the Dark Lord's three remaining Horcruxes, the magical items responsible for his immortality. But as the mystical Deathly Hallows are uncovered, and Voldemort finds out about their mission, the biggest battle begins and life as they know it will never be the same again.
list.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 45 wins & 91 nominations.

list.Title: Joker
list.Writer: Todd Phillips, Scott Silver, Bob Kane (based on characters created by), Bill Finger (based on characters created by), Jerry Robinson (based on characters created by)
list.Actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy
list.Plot: In Gotham City, mentally-troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: "The Joker".

list.Title: The End of the F***ing World
list.Actors: Jessica Barden, Alex Lawther, Steve Oram, Christine Bottomley
list.Plot: James is 17 and is pretty sure he is a psychopath. Alyssa, also 17, is the cool and moody new girl at school. The pair make a connection and she persuades him to embark on a road trip in search of her real father.

list.Title: The Society
list.Actors: Kathryn Newton, Gideon Adlon, Sean Berdy, Natasha Liu Bordizzo
list.Plot: When everyone else mysteriously vanishes from their wealthy town, the teen residents of West Ham must forge their own society to survive.

list.Title: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
list.Actors: Fionn Whitehead, Craig Parkinson, Alice Lowe, Asim Chaudhry
list.Plot: A young programmer starts to question reality when he adapts a mad writer's fantasy novel into a video game.

list.Title: Lucifer
list.Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, Lesley-Ann Brandt
list.Plot: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.

list.Title: Stranger Things
list.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard, Millie Bobby Brown
list.Plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
list.Awards: Nominated for 4 Golden Globes. Another 32 wins & 114 nominations.

list.Title: 13 Reasons Why
list.Actors: Dylan Minnette, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe, Brandon Flynn
list.Plot: Follows teenager Clay Jensen, in his quest to uncover the story behind his classmate and crush, Hannah, and her decision to end her life.
list.Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 5 nominations.

list.Title: Supernatural
list.Actors: Jared Padalecki, Jensen Ackles, Misha Collins
list.Plot: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.
list.Awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 19 wins & 73 nominations.

list.Title: How I Met Your Mother
list.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
list.Plot: A father recounts to his children, through a series of flashbacks, the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.
list.Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 25 wins & 90 nominations.

list.Title: Breaking Bad
list.Actors: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul, Dean Norris
list.Plot: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.
list.Awards: Won 2 Golden Globes. Another 144 wins & 225 nominations.

list.Title: Riverdale
list.Actors: K.J. Apa, Lili Reinhart, Camila Mendes, Cole Sprouse
list.Plot: While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark Riverdale mysteries.
